properties.address: Pocela Centre, East Riding of Yorkshire YO42 2QU
properties.description: East Riding libraries offer warm welcoming places, with comfy seating, books, games and jigsaws. Please check our website for service updates and any changes to our usual opening hours.
properties.title: Pocklington Pocela Centre

properties.address: The Wenlock Arms, Main Street, Wheldrake, York, YO19 6AA
properties.description: Sharing Life is a cross-generational community project. We hold twice monthly coffee mornings (term-time only) in The Wenlock Arms, Wheldrake. Please visit our facebook page or e-mail us for dates.The coffee mornings run 10-12 noon. They are free, although we accept donations. There is always tea, coffee, homemade cake and a warm welcome. No-one ever feels lonely coming to Sharing Life as you are met at the door by a committee member and if you are a new comer you are introduced to friendly peop
